Name: Revenge on the Streets 2
About the game: ● compatibility with xbox 360 control for one or two players ● This game has big inspiration in the classic mega drive games like 'Streets of Rage' 'Double Dragon' e 'Mighty Final Fight' ● Super rigid control schemes designed for keyboards and controllers. ● Art style, hand-drawn. ● Hardcore difficulty with over 51 different enemies ● has 3 playable characters plus 1 unlockable secret characters initial plot: After the defeat of MR Cleiton, a new crime boss appears, Romero Barbosa, an ally of his predecessor. As soon as he assumed the position of king of crime, he kidnaps one of those involved in the death of his former boss and uses it to send a message to the others involved.
